import React from 'react'; const AddBlogForm = ({ user, cleanCredentials, handleAddBlog, title, setTitle, author, setAuthor, url, setUrl }) => { return ( <>

Blogs

{user.name} logged-in

title setTitle(target.value)} />
author setAuthor(target.value)} />
url setUrl(target.value)} />
) } export default AddBlogForm;
